biography: Jarkko, nicknamed "Bailando", is a highly accomplished golfer who hails from Hirsala Golf.  Known for his consistent performance and strategic prowess on the course, Jarkko is a formidable competitor in any field.

Jarkko has participated in the prestigious Hector Trophée for four consecutive years, demonstrating both his dedication to the tournament and his skill as a player. His appearances include the 2022, 2023, 2024, and 2025 editions.

His accomplishments in the Hector Trophée are truly remarkable. In 2023, he achieved a memorable victory, winning both the coveted Hector Trophée itself and the individual Victor trophy. This dual victory showcased Jarkko's exceptional talent in both team and individual play.

A player to watch in any competition, Jarkko brings a blend of experience, skill, and a competitive spirit to every round. He is known for his powerful drives and remarkable precision on the greens.  The Hector Trophée will undoubtedly be closely watching Jarkko's progress in the years to come.
